title: Man-Eating Cow & the Chainsaw Vigilante: The Complete Works
description: MAN-EATING COW & CHAINSAW VIGILANTE THE COMPLETE WORKS TP This 344-page 'fat' trade paperback re-presents 13 classic comics from The Tick Universe, including all TEN ISSUES of the Man-Eating Cow and the entire original 3-issue Chainsaw Vigilante limited series, story and art by Zander Cannon! Features a guest-appearance by The Tick in the last two issues of THE MAN-EATING COW!
author: Clay Griffith
